description:
As the first interdimensional hive, Nylium was created by Cornflower shortly after the destruction of the original Herbabot. Nylium's functions were as a weapons and defence research hive.
The harsh climates and wildlife of The Nether proved perfect testing grounds for experimental bee-bots. It inherited Cornflower's hatred of the existing sorcerer's structure, and after the destruction of Rose and Cornflower, it became the primary plotter and planner of the hivemind.
name: Nylium
